data.message: Welcome my friend, A grand Opportunity as this Day, and for all eternity be decreed, an established frequency, envisioned & believed, now spoken as already achieved..Grand friends as these...*At an "Energy level", atomically & harmoniously flow'n in YOU, Greatness of LIFE be! Thank you for your sounds beyond that of "Molecular physics". As an equilibrium pressur'n, tidal wave display'n, "longItudinal reach'n, from between ocean giveN mediums, come'n forth with much DensIty, Grace & strength, ever reach'n propOrtional elastic modulus speeds", with Harmonic physical properties, "its intensity sure", its kinetic energy oscillat'n as grand creations arise'n, with true direction. What could this be the unlisten'd give plea, the only sure respOnse majestically given, its the arising sound of grand creativeness, within you, once hidden for a season, but now out of thee, permiat'n thro' your hearts beat, as is forever believ'd... Greatness Achieved thank you friend!
